text: Joseph Moingt (19 November 1915 - 28 July 2020) was a French jesuit. He was born in Salbris, France. He was known for working at the Institut Catholique de Paris. From 1970 to 1997, he was Director of the Recherches de science religieuse. In 2015, he turned 100. Moingt died on 28 July 2020 in Paris, aged 104.Joseph Moingt, le jésuite qui ne pouvait s'empêcher de vivre ==References== Category:1915 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French centenarians Category:French theologians Category:Writers from Paris Category:People from Loir-et-Cher
title: Joseph Moingt
